org.opencompare

Class PcmInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opencompare.PcmInspector

  • public class PcmInspector
extends java.lang.Object
    Program to calculate the absolute frequencies from a PCM object. It calculates the frequencies by cells, features, products and types.
    Since:
    2017-10-04
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group #3 PDL

        Parameters:

      • generalCountCells

        public void generalCountCells(java.lang.String frequencyName,
                              java.lang.String content)
        This method is used to calculate the frequency of a value inside a specific Frequency HashMap.
        Parameters:
        frequencyName - Name of the frequency which is going to be processed.
        content - Cell content that is going to be added to the frequency map.

      • intializeMaps

        public void intializeMaps()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This is the main method which is used to explore a PCM and call the procedures to storage the frequencies by cell, features products and type.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when theres isn't possible to write the frequencies

        public static boolean verifyPath(java.lang.String path,
                                 boolean flag)
        Verifies if the input directory to load the data set exist or not
        Parameters:
        path - Path where the PCM files are saved
        flag - Status to detect if the first load or not
        Returns:
